website_summaries.verdict: A nice if you want ice cubes that are large, but not too large.
pros: Comes with lids for easy stacking
cons: Users have reported more difficulty removing cubes from this tray than the others listed here

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portion control. Easy to remove.
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm on a diet, I have to store a lot of chicken breast in the freezer. I fit 2-3 oz of chicken breast in each well, and it works great! Takes up little space in the freezer and so easy to do portion control. Fairly easy to remove. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Weird filmy substance
customer_reviews.text: Wife here: product arrived quickly. The ice cubes are only a tiny bit difficult to remove. The problem I’m having of this filmy substance I’m finding in my drinks. Like fat floating at the top of soup. I’ve washed these very thoroughly, multiple times. I do not see this happen with any of my drinks unless they have ice from these trays, so I know it’s not my glasses or soap residue from my dishwasher or anything like that. It’s definitely coming from the ice. Another thing that’s annoying is once you remove some ice, you can’t get the lid back on securely.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Maine

customer_reviews.title: Terrific ice trays!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the square two pack with the lids, definitely recommend getting the lids - it helps as your walking over and putting the trays into the freezer. There’s a slight film on the trays, probably from the manufacturing process, so make sure and wash with hot soapy water. Once clean, these trays have been a great addition to both my scotch, and now my kids have discovered them and they’ve added mint leaves to one of the trays for their drinks. The size at 2” is perfect, the silicone helps the cubes pop out easily. Overall great product and value!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals 🤮🤢☠️
customer_reviews.text: These trays emit a terrible chemical smell. Do not buy unless you like drinking chemical flavored drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a weird use
customer_reviews.text: I know; this is a strange review. I take the lid off and use these in which to place the refillable coffee filter pods I use instead of buying those disposable kind that are being used by millions of people every day which can't be recycled. I fill the pods with good coffee grounds, then place each pod in one of the cavities and then put them in the freezer. Coffee stays fresh; I'm not adding to ocean pollutants or land fills; easy accessibility. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: LoverofClassics

customer_reviews.title: Take ice cubes to a new level
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for making keto ice cream. Before that happened though, I made homemade chicken broth. I decided to freeze it and it occurred to me that it would be handy to put it in this tray. I had one quart of broth and it exactly fit into the eight 1/2 cup ice cube cavities. Nice. I also make "sprout juice" with my broccoli sprouts and have to freeze it because there is more than I need right away. So it's convenient to take out a half cup of sprout juice or a half cup of chicken broth when I need it. I'm buying extras because these are so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these trays to save time when making my healthy green smoothies. I use one tray to freeze Spinach (with plain or coconut water) and the other is used for a mix of Kale and Collard Greens (also with water). I blend them up, freeze them and my smoothies are made in seconds. The top makes the trays easy to stack and the greens not spill out. The size is perfect, also. With traditional ice cube trays, I need to use too many cubes because their size is too small. The frozen cubes pop out easily. I do not put them in the dishwasher because sometimes some of the greens stick and need to be soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kart

customer_reviews.title: Stinky ice cube
customer_reviews.text: Man, this thing stink. Don't know how can it be used without smell. Washed multiple times but can't get rid of the odor. Made 1 batch of ice and have to wash them to reduce the smell. Why can't it be made of plastic?
customer_reviews.author: L. H

customer_reviews.title: This product has a strong odor and the ice has a bad taste similar to the odor.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a month and I thought the bad odor and resulting bad taste in the ice cubes would go away after a time. The smell is still fairly strong and the ice cubes still have a really bad taste. This product is totally unusable. I have washed it several times in a dishwasher hoping that would remove the bad taste without any change to the resulting taste. I would never buy anything from this brand. I wish I could return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great for freezing juice
customer_reviews.text: Our lime tree is abundant, but all the limes come ripe about the same time. Therefore, I was looking for a way to freeze the juice so I could preserve this abundant harvest. These trays are perfect! The cubes are the perfect size for taking out when lime juice is needed. Flexible design makes cube removal easy. Also, I’m now truly with it when serving bourbon, as ice cubes made with this tray are the preferred size for bourbon connoisseurs - providing the proper chill without too much melting.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Holtan

customer_reviews.title: Great Trays Producing HUGE Ice Cubes
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR SUMMER, these trays have been filling my ice needs for nearly 2 years now. I'm very happy with them. I had never used silicone ice trays, and will never use anything else from now on. I don't remove the ice in the traditional twisting way as with plastic trays. Rather, I twist just a bit then push up the individual cube from the bottom of the tray and slides right out. The cover keeps the ice from absorbing any odors in the fridge too - a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Santa

customer_reviews.title: Large ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. He likes larger ice cubes in his drinks so they don't melt fast and water them down. We have an automatic ice maker that makes 2 different size cubes and also crushers the ice. He doesn't like any of that. I purchased some plastic trays and he said they were too hard to get the ice out of the tray. He loves these, says the ice cubes are the right size, they are easily removed from the tray and the best thing is, he can drink his bourbon over ice without the ice diluting the taste. Perfect for alcoholic drinks, especially.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Davis

customer_reviews.title: Tray is great, lid is just ok
customer_reviews.text: Makes nice large cubes, and they are quite easy to pop out due to the flexibility of the tray...you just have to give it a twist and push the cube out by pressing at the bottom of the tray. The lids, however, don't stay on that well, because both they and the tray are flexible, so it doesn't seal very well or stay on. Lids are made from a very soft material that flexes too much, they should have been more rigid. IMO, get the version that has the trays, but don't spend money on the lids. The trays themselves are great though.
customer_reviews.author: PETE

customer_reviews.title: Buy these to chill the perfect rocks cocktail
customer_reviews.text: It does take longer for these cubes to freeze solid, but that’s to be expected given that they are smalll blocks of ice as opposed to being a typical ice cube. I failed to take that into consideration, the first time I wanted to use them and they weren’t quite ready!! Be sure you allow extra time (a minimum of 24 hours) in the freezer, before you need them. I love that these trays have lids, so ice cubes stay fresh and clean tasting!! The silicone tray makes extracting the cubes/blocks a breeze. Just a little twist and they pop right out.
customer_reviews.author: krz4xms

customer_reviews.title: Nice big ice cubes, too big for some bottles
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, these trays create large ice cubes that last for a long time in drinks. The silicon seems like good quality and I expect them to last. Unfortunately, some bottles I wanted to use them in have openings that are too small. But that's my fault for not measuring properly. So just be aware they need a very large opening to fit through.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for cubes, lid doesn't seal like I wanted. Still too floppy for easy transfer when full.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, lid is not as easy to get on as it would seem once tray is full. Another thing is, j thought there would be more of a seal around the lid/edge of the tray. Overall, yes it makes cubes but the main function k wanted was the lid to lock out freezer odors and to make it a bit more sturdy for transferring the trays filled with premade smoothies in and out of fridge and it's not quite what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rena D.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This year I told my kids to take their insulated water bottles to school instead of the plastic bottles that we keep in the fridge for emergencies (we live in Florida). I put two or three cubes in their bottles and they last the whole school day. To get the ice out, I just leave the tray on the counter while preparing their school lunches. If for some reason they don't easily come out, I just put the tray under the faucet (bottom up) for a few seconds and then they come out.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: need only one cube in a cocktail or beer drink
customer_reviews.text: Takes up small space in freezer...pushing up from bottom releases cubes...like the lid which helps protect from freezer odors ..but lid does not snap on as tightly as I expected it to do...
customer_reviews.author: cannabina

customer_reviews.title: Great for freezing baby food!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically so I could freeze baby food in them. They work great! Each cavity is about 4.4 ounces filled to the brim, so they are the perfect size for a serving of baby food. The food is usually easy to remove as long you run hot water down the back and sides of the tray or leave it out for a few minutes. I have never used them to freeze water but a great alternative way to freeze baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ice cubes in rock glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I love these Ice cube trays. The ice cubes are great for liquor drinks. I I I They keep the drinks cold without a lot of smaller ice cubes that melt quicker. I guess you could use them for any drinks but I use them in rock glasses for my whiskey and water or on the rocks. The silicone makes them easy to get the cubes out.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Beveled Beverage-Coolers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these ice trays; I haven't had any trouble with smells or white residue or with removing them, and the large cube lasts for hours in any beverage. I also put a few in my Camelbak bladder for hikes, and they keep the whole 2.5 liters nice and cool against my back and for drinking for entire hikes.
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: A big EEhhh
customer_reviews.text: It’s a big EHH for me because they’re not easily removable. I think it’s possibly the thickness of the silicon on this design. My partner got another set of ice cube trays that works better and removes with ease. I noticed that the silicon was thinner making it easier to remove the ice from the tray.
customer_reviews.author: sandra ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.text: Best ice trays out there. I love that although they are silicone they are solid. Whether they are full of water; ice or empty, they are solid and keep their shape. They do not bend. The solid sturdy tops/ lids are nice as well to keep ice clean. One ice cube is all you really need; they’re large!
customer_reviews.author: mmarli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I was using small(2"x2") plastic containers to make big ice cubes when it occurred to me that BPA toxins were probably leaching into my ice, and me!! So glad I accidentally found these on Amazon. I prefer LARGE ice cubes, and the ice maker on my low quality French Door fridge (it was here when I bought the place) quit working soon after I arrived. So I make my own ice now and with these I make it CUSTOM!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana M Mercier

customer_reviews.title: great product but I have some difficulty getting the ice cubes out
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but its a bit of a struggle to get the ice cubes out. I gave them 5 stars anyways cause I guess it should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: mldlylt

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cubs Hard to take out
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's just from first-time use or not, but the ice cubes are a little hard to take out. I've also noticed that when I fill it, once frozen they frost over almost like freezer burn on top. May not have gotten the lid closed all the way but they stack very well, dont take up too much space in the freezer and the cubes are perfect size for my glasses. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, Making it work, not so much
customer_reviews.text: The bottom seems ok and works fairly well except it takes quite a bit of pressure to liberate the ice cubes. The top doesn't stay attached. Different material and it should be silicone too. Corners chipped off of my covers in less than a month. Different materials with different temperature and flexibility properties. Bound to happen. The bottom flexes in the cold, the top doesn't, just breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Morbius

customer_reviews.title: Nice size ice cubes.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted larger ice cubes and these trays give me that. It did take me a bit to figure out how to get the cubes out. I discovered that if I let them sit for a few minutes before trying to remove the ice cubes it worked easier. Then I turned the trays over onto their plastic lids and used the heal of my hand to press down on each section. After that the cubes came out fairly easiily.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great for freezing small quantities of sauces and purees
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after reading a suggestion in a cookbook about storing left-over sauces, dressings and purees. The size of the cubes is perfect. I have only used it once so far, but hope to do more with it. The only issue is that the lid does not really snap on so I need to be sure I place it into the freezer in such a way that nothing knocks off the lid.
customer_reviews.author: BiGi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to (everything)
customer_reviews.text: I am a 28 years old with no wrist or fingers weakness, so I guess you should consider that. The blocks come out pretty easily. I use them to make green smoothies with LOTS of fats like avocado and flaxseed oil, so that might be the reason they come out pretty easily of the tray, when some people might have problem. I guess it might depend on the use you give it....or it might not....It might just depend on how strong your hands are, so... Just try!
customer_reviews.author: Sanchez A.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I make my own baby food. I liked how they were bigger so they could fit one serving in one cup. However, they are very very difficult to remove frozen food out of. I didn't try regular ice cubes, but I would imagine they would be the same way. I will be returning because they for sure did work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cube trays
customer_reviews.text: Great ice cube trays for making old fashioned’s or drinking “neat”. Very flexible and easy to remove the cubes. Love that they have lids to keep the ice clean and can be stacked easily in your freezer. Lasts a long time and doesn’t water down your drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hart

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to remove cubes, no oncluded suggestions
customer_reviews.text: It does provide uniformly sized ice cubes, and the lids keep the otherwise exposed ice protected. It has been difficult to remove the ice cubes as the trays are flexible but do not twist to free the cubes, and ice is not easily removed when attempting to peel the tray from the cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Ice cube tray
customer_reviews.text: I like how big the size of the ice this tray makes. They last forever. Sometimes it's not easy to remove, but when it does come out, it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: CBK

customer_reviews.title: Great to make large ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for whiskey ice cubes. They work perfectly for just that. The lids fit well and they clean up easily. They work best to get the ice cubes out if you run the bottom of the tray under a little bit of warm water.
customer_reviews.author: AJones Idaho

customer_reviews.title: The perfect ice cubes for iced tea. Really.
customer_reviews.text: Although these are made for use with alcohol, I find that they are the perfect ice cubes for drinks like my iced tea. I love these so much, I am actually happy to NOT have an ice maker. Try them! I recommend these ice trays to EVERYONE who uses ice.
customer_reviews.author: david jennings hansen

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I've recently gotten into drink mixing and wanted to get ice cube trays that made large square cubes. These freeze well, the tops stick on well, and after freezing it leaves me with the ability to have one crushed and one whole cube! They were great for the party I threw for my husband as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Rayneuki

customer_reviews.title: Great product for mixed drinks!
customer_reviews.text: Produces large ice cubes perfect for most wide mouthed containers. The trays themselves are great quality and are easy to clean. I have found that the tray lids do not stay on well when the cubes freeze the expansion of the cubes pushed the lid off. If you don’t fill the trays to full capacity it seems to solve this problem. Pair one of these cubes witht a yeti or insulated cup and these cubes last for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen White

customer_reviews.title: Smells but works
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. It does have a strange factory smell but soaking it in diluted lemon juice, baking soda, or boiling water should remove the smell. I had to do all three. Ice cubes are easy to remove when you hold the adjacent ones and push from the bottom. It does take some force.
customer_reviews.author: Whoody

customer_reviews.title: Works in RVs
customer_reviews.text: Bought both the large and small ice cube trays to use in my RV. Because water expands when it freezes, fill to about 75 to 80% of capacity. Then it is easy to remove the cubes, which are ... ice cubes. The lid ensures some insurance against spillage, freezing is surprisingly fast, and there is enough ice for martinis at 5!
customer_reviews.author: SAJ

customer_reviews.title: OK but hard to get cubes out!
customer_reviews.text: I like the big cubes and I bought the trays with lids which are nice...but OMG!! I have been having a heck of a time getting the darn ice cubes out of the tray! I read the reviews and tried everyones recommendations, but I'm obviously challenged in some way when it comes to removing these things!
customer_reviews.author: TFA

customer_reviews.title: Great for events
customer_reviews.text: I used the trays for an event serving lemonade. I filled the tray with lemonade and placed lemon chunks in each slot. No watery lemonade! These are a must have if throwing lots of parties or events.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Makes great ice cubes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these large ice cube trays so I could use at a party to fill up a drink dispenser. They were perfect!!! I tossed in blueberries and lemonade and froze them. I was able to make a few batches of trays before the party and they were perfect. Everyone loved seeing them float through the glass dispenser I was using. I had no issues removing the cubes. Just push them out the bottom and they are great. I rinsed them off and then put in my dishwasher; came out fine. I do recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Freezing Fresh Herbs
customer_reviews.text: The trays arrived timely and were exactly as described. I'm using them to freeze fresh herbs and pestos. Although a bit large for a single portion, they are still perfect. Their flexibility and locking top make it easy to pop out the herbs while maintaining the freshness over time in the freezer. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MWL

customer_reviews.title: I really like the trays
customer_reviews.text: I really like the trays, they’re nice and large. I used them to freeze bone broth. And you get 1/3 cup with each cube. But the lid does not actually lock in place - or even stay in place. More like just sits on top of the tray. When you move the tray the lid comes off. They are good for stacking but i was expecting a better lid.
customer_reviews.author: Maleli

customer_reviews.title: Used for baby food
customer_reviews.text: The cubes are a great size for one serving of pureed fruit or veggies for the crawling baby. The lids fit snuggly and I am pleased with the quality of the product. Just let the tray sit at room temp for a few minutes then turn upside down and press. The trays are hard to find in the stores so... Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For all of the people that said the ice cube was too hard to get out, are you freaking kidding me??????? A monkey could have made a scotch on the rock with this ice maker! AWESOME!!!!!! Ice cube lasts about three drinks! Cheers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: You gotta have these in your freezer!!
customer_reviews.text: First off, these cubes just look cool in your glass. They keep your drink nice and cold but don't start watering your drink down as fast as a bunch of small cubes do. I have a friend who likes a little bourbon on the rocks.....he loved the single big square cube in the glass !! On top of everything, Amazon got it to me within 36 hours of me ordering online. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario E. Resto

customer_reviews.title: Block ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to remove. The ice has a white residue- unsure if this is from the tray or what. It’s hard to get the residue out of the tray. When the ice melts in the glass, the residue is in the glass as well. Other than that, great ice!
customer_reviews.author: tkwski

customer_reviews.title: Nice and useful
customer_reviews.text: The trays are very useful for me because I freeze my daughter’s food in them. The only complaint that bothers me is that the lids should close tighter and easier. The lids are very loose because they don’t have a good snap system
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Villordo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality ice cube trays
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for. The trays make beautifully-formed, square cubes creating inviting cocktails. The nice snap-on lids were the selling point for me. Although it will take me a little practice to get the lid on the water-filled tray without spilling water. Makes stacking in the freezer a snap!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Annette Otway

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ice is perfect size for a DOF glass, lid provides good protection and a probably a little clearer ice cubes due to more directionally-even cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F

customer_reviews.title: One Is Great The Other A Pain
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 and one of the trays works great, the cubes pop right out. The other though, it's an act of Congress to get the tray to let go of the cubes. I can break the seal on the sides but it just has a hard time letting go on the bottom of the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Ice tray pack. I really loved the way the Ice cubes are beveled on the bottom and it keeps my Ice Tea cols for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Punisher Fan

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Sturdy and Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: So far, everything is what I expected. Very easy to use, remove the cube and clean as needed. Love the fact that these have a lid and stack easily. Unlike other reviews, I did not find any offensive smells with the silicone or experience issue with removing the cubes. Recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Nice Big Cubes
customer_reviews.text: These work great, one cube fills a Hi Ball glass, with no room, so measure your glasses. Perfect for mine, a couple of oz of bourbon fit nicely around this cube. It can be a little bit of a struggle to push the cube out of the Silicone tray, so if you have trouble with such things I could imagine this becoming a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Only got one use out of it!!
customer_reviews.text: The silicone dividers are one ply and tire when trying to remove the ice cubes the first time. Cheaply constructed. Lid did not fit well either. I tried another brand called “Bloxx” which has a double ply divider and is more durable, easier to remove the ice and easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. It's a good design, easy to remove the ice cubes, and you can stack them because of the lids. Arrived on time with good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Andria Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a great quality ice tray, these are definitely an option. I was impressed when I opened the package. These are nice and thick, and sturdy and allows the ice to be easily removed. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nats

customer_reviews.title: I bought them for the size.
customer_reviews.text: I just filled them for the first time with coconut milk. I use them for making my diet milk shakes. I let you know more as I use them. They seem well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use ice box as described. For baby/cat food preps
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. We used it to freeze portioned home made cat food. It’s easy to fill. Freeze well. And easy to remove-just a little twist is all you need
customer_reviews.author: catty

customer_reviews.title: Rubber trays make all the difference
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these trays! They aren't hard plastic like the last trays I had, which cracked after about 2 uses. These are rubber and it's very easy to get the ice cubes out of them. The cubes are the perfect size for straight liquor "on the rocks" and one cube is enough for a whiskey glass.
customer_reviews.author: HoustonTexansfan

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect the cover to remain on. When ice expands it pushes the lid off. The ice can be hard to get out.
customer_reviews.author: GRW

customer_reviews.title: Large, Lovely Ice Cubes.
customer_reviews.text: Love how huge the ice cubes are. I used them specifically for my Yeti 64 oz. Flask. One tray can fill my Yeti and can stay cold all day. I use both trays but I alternate emptying them out one every 24 hours for my Yeti. Only because I feel the ice can stay around longer the more it's been in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tray, easy to pop out ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: I love having huge ice cubes that don’t melt quickly. Wether it’s in my water or Whiskey drink. The ice cubes pop out easily. Having a large tray like this also makes it easy to add lemon, fruit, mint etc to the water and freeze it. Perfect infused ice cubes for refreshing water during the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great tray for big cocktail style cubes
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. The cubes are big enough they don’t melt too quickly and dilute your cocktail. They release fairly easily from the silicon mold. The lid even works reasonably well, which IME is often a problem with silicone ice cube trays.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Roser

customer_reviews.title: Large cubes
customer_reviews.text: I really like the large ice cubes. The cover is a little ackward however having the cover is a bonus. I find it slightly challenging to get the ice cubes out. However I love the big cubes and will continue to use these I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Triolo Vita

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose!
customer_reviews.text: I got this about a year ago now I think. I use it for regular ice but it also helps with cooking! I like to make a big batch of my own broths for later and this is so great! I can pour it into nice squares and toss it into my recipes as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Kennanigans

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: One of them made the ice taste like chemicals. Washed several times but taste remains. Other one works great.
customer_reviews.author: revitupmoto33

customer_reviews.title: Mold is okay but lid cracked
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the mold will probably last a while. For some odd reason, my lid cracked a few weeks after it was in the freezer. Had not been through the dishwasher, just cracked in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the first cube out
customer_reviews.text: They work great, and I love the big cubes. It's really hard to get the first cube out, but after that the rest are easy to remove. These are much better than the hard plastic trays.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Trays work, lids are a miss
customer_reviews.text: I like these. It is easy to get the cubes out of the tray. The thing I do not like are the kids. I did not expect the lids to be made from such a floppy rubber, but more of a stiff rubber. Since they're weak they do not hold much of a shape to really "snap" onto the trays, they kind of just sit on top.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get out of tray because of design.
customer_reviews.text: They are hard to get out because the sides of each ice doesn’t come up very far. I gave them away, and purchased ‘peak’. Much better tray and very easy to get out. I wasted my money. I love Peak ice cube trays.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Seem very durable. Actually used them to make chopped fresh mint ice cubes for decorative, tasty ice water.
customer_reviews.author: Jammin6970

customer_reviews.title: holey :(
customer_reviews.text: i bought these trays to store breast milk in because it's such a great size and later on i can do baby food too! sadly there was a big tear and when i poured my milk in it ran right out all over the counter. sooo my brilliant idea didn't work, but if it had these are great sized cubes! update: they keep getting more holes?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Now I can serve pretentious old fashions like the rest of them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small bar, and the backup tray is a must. The cubes aren’t perfect but there’s probably something I can do to make them perfectly square and clear if I really wanted to spend the time
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Used for making baby food
customer_reviews.text: Used this to store baby food. Works amazing for portions. Just run under hot water after food is frozen to pop out the food square and store in freezer bag.
customer_reviews.author: WW47

customer_reviews.title: Nice,  but the covers are worthless
customer_reviews.text: The covers do not fit. They sort of sit on top of the tray so don’t expect them to work as any help to minimize spillage. At best, they may minimize chances of the ice taking on any flavors from other things in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Baby food freezer
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make cubes of baby food. I poured eater in to see how big the compartments were and i just filled according to how much food or breast milk i need each time. Boiled it twoce and soaked in baking soda water to remove the initial factory smell.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Good, but lid doesn't stay on
customer_reviews.text: I like this ice cube tray, but the lid just lays on top of the tray. It does not snap in or anything. Good for stacking the trays, but don't expect to move the tray around with the lid on and expect it not to spill.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Love the lids!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I replaced all of my whiskey ice with these. I especially love the kids which means they don’t spill and I can stack them. Good space saver!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy the large ice cubes in drinks. We previously has a hard plastic ice tray. It cracked and let water run out into the freezer. These ice trays are very flexible and it is so easy to remove the ice. Great product. I highly, highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Atrisan cubes are in fashion
customer_reviews.text: These trays are fantastic. Cubes are easily removed, the size is perfect for your favorite spirits on the rocks and best of all they have covers, which minimizes the cubes absorbing others odors and allows them to be stacked unlike the competitors, that fact makes this product stand alone in the class. Artisan cubes are in fashion and this is an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Mister

customer_reviews.title: Liked the idea...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of big ice cubes and this ice tray will make them. It's just a pain in the butt to use.
customer_reviews.author: John Dent

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the trays with lids, received no lids.
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews, I see I am not the only one who has experienced this. The label on the package stated they were with lids, but there are no lids included. I am returning and will try again.......update to follow. Returned the first order and re-ordered. 2nd set came with the lids. Work great, makes for a perfect ice cube in a highball glass! Also, received an email from the seller stating there had been an issue with the warehouse and they would be happy to send the lids directly to me --
customer_reviews.author: Ched

customer_reviews.title: Easy removal of BIG cubes. Great to have a lid.
customer_reviews.text: Really great design. The lid is a must have. Many do not include a lid. Nice big cubes. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JILI

customer_reviews.title: Love these large ice cubes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you like large ice cubes. Takes two days to freeze solid. Do not overfill, as water expands when freezing. Leave 1/8 inch at the top otherwise the cubes will freeze together. Leave the tray out for a few minutes after freezing and the cubes will pop right out.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: they are useless. These are going back
customer_reviews.text: I was looking specifically for ice cube trays with lids and these lids will not stay on, they are useless. These are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trays, cover a bonus
customer_reviews.text: We use they to freeze fresh herbs from summer garden. Works great for this. I'm sure it makes nice ice cubes as well
customer_reviews.author: TomB

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to get 1 cube out of the form
customer_reviews.text: Nice size cubes and great for an Old Fashioned, but it's very difficult to get the cubes out of the form.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: Water or whiskey these are the best
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a nice addition to our making. I’m pregnant so drinking water is a must all the time and these ice cubes last for hours in my cup. On the flip side my husband loves them for his whiskey and cokes as one large cube last a drink plus some without taking up as much room as a bunch of little ones .
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ice cubes for alcoholic beverages
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money. Shape and quality are delivery on every use of this product. The quality of the trade is beyond expected, thick rubber for better durability. I strongly recommend the use of this product to make ice for alcoholic beverages
customer_reviews.author: eli r. salazar

customer_reviews.text: Rinse over cool water to easily remove ice cubes. Love the large squares. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Utz

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy - ice cubes impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used them a few times now and the ice cubes are extremely difficult to remove. I gave up trying. Boyfriend tried to help and was like wtf the ice won’t come out. Tried hitting it on the counter and even then they were locked in, wouldn’t pop out. Will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Maja

customer_reviews.title: Great Treys Perfect Large Size
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ice trays! Perfect size large cubes. They are not clear. Study the science around clear ice. Don’t be fooled by trays claiming they do this. This company did no such claim and made awesome, lidded, silicon trays!
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Just made my first batch of ice and the cubes came out great. They were very easy to remove from the try as well. Will recommend to all of my whiskey drinking friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! But a challenge to remove- flip it upside down and run hot water for a few secs and out they pop
customer_reviews.author: Pea

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to use in drinks, thinking they would last longer than typical bagged ice cubes. However these for some reason instantly make carbonated drinks flat. Weirdest thing.
customer_reviews.author: melissa masias

customer_reviews.title: These are not 2" cubes.  No real advantage over regular ice cube tray ice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and cheap but they aren't the premium large ice cubes you'd expect. The cubes are not 2". They are 1.75". I know that a quarter inch doesn't seem like much but there are slightly larger than regular ice cube tray cubes. I bought these to have for whisky but not at all worth it .
customer_reviews.author: EagleOne

customer_reviews.title: Love the large, slow-melting ice cubes!
customer_reviews.text: Love the large, slow-melting, ice cubes! I do have some difficulty getting the cubes out of the tray, but that might get just be me.
customer_reviews.author: ConeyIslandMN

product_meta.title: Samuelworld Ice Cube Tray With Lids Large Size Silicone Flexible 8 Cavity Ice Maker for Whiskey and Cocktails or Homemade, Keep Drinks Chilled (2pc/Pack) …
feature_bullets: With Lids and Most Easy To Use - Just fill with water, soda, herbs, fruits or juice, etc. and just put it into the freezer, you will have perfect ice cube. The lids are help to prevent the odor in the freezer, to keep the ices fresh long.
More Ice Cubes- It can make 8x2 big squares under 2 inch at once. Enjoy more drinks.
Must Needed For Your Bar And Kitchen- Perfect to chill cocktails, whiskey, tequila, vodka or other drinks with less dilution. And more uses for other homemade, for soup, or flower ice.
Safe to Use- Use pure premium food-grade silicone freezer, microwave and top-rack dishwasher safe. BPA free and meeting U.S. FDA standard.
100% Lifetime Guarantee with proof of purchase. we make every order with a complete money back guarantee.
